title: data brokers
extract: A Data Broker is a business that aggregates information from a variety of sources; processes it to enrich, cleanse or analyze it; and licenses it to other organizations. Data brokers can also license another company's data directly, or process another organization's data to provide them with enhanced results.
extract_html: A Data Broker is a business that aggregates information from a variety of sources; processes it to enrich, cleanse or analyze it; and licenses it to other organizations. Data brokers can also license another company's data directly, or process another organization's data to provide them with enhanced results.
